title: Turret Aggro Not working
body:
Has anyone else been having issues with turret aggro in lane? In a few of my games i have been next to my tower or there abouts and have been attacked by the enemy champ yet the tower hasnt swapped aggro to them.

I understand that both have to be within the range but for some reason it doesnt seem to be swapping to them on the odd occasion.
it seems to be since the most recent update.

replies.body: Well, there is a one second delay where the enemy has to constantly stay in turret range in order to be shot. Are you sure it's not that?
